mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ( SELECT ((COUNT(*) - 1) / 15) FROM statements WHERE 1=1 AND company_cd = '00001' AND date >= '2019-11-01' AND date < '2019-12-31' )as pagenum, seq, TO_CHAR(STT.date, 'YY') AS year, TO_CHAR(STT.date, 'MM') AS month, TO_CHAR(STT.date, 'DD') AS date, STT.account_cd, ACC.title as acc_title, STT.customer_cd, CUS.title as cus_title, STT.classify, STT.debtor, STT.creditor, STT.abs, STT.mod_date FROM statements AS STT, account AS ACC, customer AS CUS WHERE 1=1 AND STT.company_cd = '00001' AND STT.date >= '2019-11-01' AND STT.date < '2019-12-31' AND STT.company_cd = CUS.company_cd AND STT.customer_cd = CUS.cus_cd AND STT.account_cd = ACC.acc_cd
ORDER BY STT.date DESC, seq DESC
LIMIT 15 OFFSET ${pagenum} * 15
LIMIT 30 OFFSET ${pagenum} * 30 - 15
) AS foo ORDER BY year ASC, month ASC, date ASC

DELETE FROM statements WHERE 1=1 AND company_cd = #{item.company_cd} AND seq = #{item.seq}::INTEGER

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM statements AS STT WHERE 1=1 AND STT.company_cd = '00001' AND STT.date >= '2019-11-01' AND STT.date < '2019-12-31' ORDER BY SEQ ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE statements SET company_cd = #{new}, mod_id = 'Admin', mod_date = (SELECT CURRENT_DATE), mod_prog = 'Web-kaikei' WHERE 1=1 AND company_cd = #{org}
mapper.select: SELECT STT.acc_cd, CASE WHEN STT.acc_cd::INTEGER > 980 THEN 'Cost' WHEN STT.acc_cd::INTEGER > 960 THEN 'Asset' WHEN STT.acc_cd::INTEGER > 450 THEN 'Cost' WHEN STT.acc_cd::INTEGER > 400 THEN 'Profit' WHEN STT.acc_cd::INTEGER > 330 THEN 'Capital' WHEN STT.acc_cd::INTEGER > 250 THEN 'Debt' WHEN STT.acc_cd::INTEGER > 100 THEN 'Asset' END AS classify, ACC.title, STT.deb, STT.deb - STT.cred AS debbal, STT.cred, STT.cred - STT.deb AS credbal FROM ( SELECT account_cd AS acc_cd, SUM(debtor) AS deb, SUM(creditor) AS cred FROM statements WHERE 1=1 AND company_cd = #{company_cd} GROUP BY account_cd ) AS STT, account AS ACC WHERE ACC.acc_cd = STT.acc_cd ORDER BY ACC.acc_cd ASC
